title: Young Thug Gets Engaged to Mariah the Scientist With an Onstage Proposal: See Her Ring
summary: Thugger got on a knee at his Dec. 16 show in Atlanta and asked, "What you say?"
body: Young Thug put on a ring on it. Thugger and his longtime girlfriend, Mariah the Scientist , got engaged on Tuesday night (Dec. 16) after the Atlanta rapper proposed to the singer while on stage. Related Young Thug Reveals Mariah the Scientist Broke Up With Him: ‘But I Still Got a Girl’ Young Thug Explains Why He Can’t Be Around Gunna Since Jail: ‘I Still Want You to Eat, Just Not at My Table’ GloRilla Says She’s Back on Good Terms With Young Thug After Leaked Jail Phone Call: ‘We Cool’ Thugger got down on a knee while performing at his Hometown Hero concert in Atlanta, which had Mariah in shock. A “Will You Marry Me” graphic was blasted across the jumbotron screen as the crowd erupted into a frenzy. The couple shared a warm embrace with Thug still holding the ring out while on a knee. “What you say?” he asked. “Put it on,” she exclaimed back to her man, giving her approval. Mariah later added, “I guess I’m getting married” before kissing Thugger. Atlanta-based photographer Prince Williams captured a better look at the double-barreled diamond-encrusted ring backstage…
